The double tap of https:##developer#android#com@B_android#view#KeyEvent#KEYCODE_MEDIA_PLAY_PAUSE_E@ or https:##developer#android#com@B_android#view#KeyEvent#KEYCODE_HEADSETHOOK_E@ will call the @B_android#support#v4#media#session#MediaSessionCompat#Callback#onSkipToNext_E@ by default.
